We launched today the project of the city of Medan 1 tourist, commercial and residential area of ​​3.6 million square meters http://t.co/PlFlVKcv3s

The project will include a population of 78 thousand people in addition to a water channel with a length of 4 km and a marina and beaches and fountains of a dance height of 442 m above the world http://t.co/C5Alv1Yyx3
Medan 1 will include the longest 1.2 km long ski lounge, a 25,000m2 sports hall and a 5.3m long running and bicycle path. Http://t.co/3AFqpRFbBW
Medan 1 will also feature a hall for 8000 people to host all events and a public square for 60,000 to host major national events http://t.co/d4Wo1FSEGr
The first phase of Medan 1 project will be completed in 2020 in conjunction with the hosting of Expo 2020 .. We will give the best experience to the visitors of Expo in its history, God willing
